TopicTitle: Project: Pathfinder, the ultimate grand tour!

Articles.Content:
Hello all, I would like to introduce to you all the Project: Pathfinder mission! The ultimate grand tour! We are a group of KSP players that are planning a huge LMP mission to do a grand tour of Kerbal Star Systems. We are looking for pilots, engineers will to help us! You can find us on discord in the link below, more info will be there on the welcome message channel! 

https://discord.gg/EzjcnrW
